text: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱتَّقُوا۟ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيكُمْ وَمَا خَلْفَكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ

translation.en.sahih: But when it is said to them, "Beware of what is before you and what is behind you; perhaps you will receive mercy... "
translation.id.indonesian: Dan apabila dikatakan kepada mereka: "Takutlah kamu akan siksa yang dihadapanmu dan siksa yang akan datang supaya kamu mendapat rahmat", (niscaya mereka berpaling).
